name: Xuanyu Cao
content: Washington State University Skip to site navigation Skip to site navigation Skip to content Quicklinks / Search Give Xuanyu Cao Raymond and Beverly Lorenz Distinguished Assistant Professor in ECE School of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science Washington State University, Pullman, WA Email: xuanyu.cao@wsu.edu Office: EME B47 I am looking for self-motivated PhD students with strong math background to join my group at WSU. The positions will be supported by Research Assistantship. If you are interested, please send me your CV, transcripts, certificates of GPA ranking (if any), English test scores (if any), and any materials that can showcase your strength.
